## TerrainTechniqueParams interface

Technique used to render a terrain geometry with a texture. When using this technique, the datasource will produce texture coordinates in local tile space (i.e. \[0,0\] at south-west and \[1,1\] at north-east tile corner).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TerrainTechniqueParams extends StandardTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [heightBasedColors](./harp-datasource-protocol.terraintechniqueparams.heightbasedcolors.md) | [HeightBasedColors](./harp-datasource-protocol.heightbasedcolors.md) | Colors to be applied at different heights (as a results of a <code>displacementMap</code>). |
|  [heightGradientInterpolation](./harp-datasource-protocol.terraintechniqueparams.heightgradientinterpolation.md) | "Discrete" \| "Linear" \| "Cubic" | If <code>heightBasedColors</code> is defined, this value defines the interpolation method used to generate the height-based gradient texture (defaults to <code>Discrete</code>). |
|  [heightGradientWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.terraintechniqueparams.heightgradientwidth.md) | number | If <code>heightBasedColors</code> is defined, this value defines the width (in pixels) of the generated gradient texture (defaults to <code>128</code>). |
